body: Bicycle Businesses       A commercial use authorization from the park is required to guide trips in Yellowstone National Park. The businesses listed below are authorized to guide bicycle trips in Yellowstone.      A Adventure Cycling Association — (406) 721-1776 Alta Expedition USA/Canada, Inc. — (702) 800-3556 B Backroads, Inc. — (510) 527-1889 C Cycling Escapes — (714) 267-4591 E Escape Adventures, Inc. — (702) 274-3862 L Lizard Head Cycling Guides — (970) 728-5891 T Teton Mountain Bike Tours — (307) 733-0712 Timberline Bicycle Tours — (303) 368-4418 W Western Spirit Cycling — (435) 259-8732 Wilderness Ventures — (307) 733-2122 Woman Tour, Inc. — (208) 232-5293 X Xanterra Parks & Resorts — (866) 439-7375 Xanterra Adventures, Inc. — (406) 655-4591
